Display/Edit Metadata¶

This module allows for the display and custom editing of metadata associated with EDI data. The options are:

  1. Station Name – Shows the current name of a station to be displayed or edited.

  2. Rename Station Name – The station name can be changed, e.g. if the data were rotated this can be added to the station name.

  3. Locality information – The geographic coordinates, elevation and projected coordinates of the station. The latter are in the Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM) projection and the UTM zone is shown:

  • Latitude

  • Longitude

  • Elevation

  • UTM X Coordinate

  • UTM Y Coordinate

  • UTM Zone

  1. Rotation – By default this is zero, but if the user rotated the data this rotation angle can be recorded here.
